ValidationRule.description: Ensures an End User Account is attached and Reseller is named to opportunity before a SPA can be requested
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: or(and( Distributor_Account__c = true, Reseller_Exists__c = false),and( Distributor_Account__c = true, Reseller_State__c = null, Partner_Account_Search__c = null))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add a reseller to "Reseller Account". If you could not locate the reseller account, please add to Reseller Company Name and the Reseller State.
